intro: Sceletium joubertii, commonly known as the Kaffir lime or African醉茄, is a succulent plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Aizoaceae family and is characterized by its fleshy, ribbed stems and small, clustered leaves. The plant produces yellow flowers that are followed by small, round fruits containing seeds. It is adapted to arid environments and is often found in rocky or sandy soils. Sceletium joubertii is also known for its historical use in traditional medicine.
